name: Mobile Idea Dump [ADHD] Dashboard Add-On
description: What is this?This is a single page template to go with my Beginner ADHD Daily Dashboard.How it works:This Notion template simplifies accessing your databases on mobile, allowing you to edit or open them from anywhere, making your life easier and more productive.What if I need help?There is no shame in needing help, Notion can be very overwhelming! We have a discord server you can join for free to ask questions in a safe and non-shameful environment.Template Instructions & Overview Video:
features: This is a single page template to go with my Beginner ADHD Daily Dashboard.; This Notion template simplifies accessing your databases on mobile, allowing you to edit or open them from anywhere, making your life easier and more productive.; There is no shame in needing help, Notion can be very overwhelming! We have a discord server you can join for free to ask questions in a safe and non-shameful environment.
